roleset.name: name
roleset.note: PARASAIL-V, PARASAILING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

role.descr: entity driving the boat (outside agent of parasailing)

example.name: parasail-v: unusual both args
example.text: A private Rusky beach made a massive cock-up this week when it parasailed a screaming/crying donkey in the air for 30 minutes
